revised_title: Embryogeny of Comatula rosacea: A Study of Larval Development and Pseudembryo Formation
tldr: This study investigates the embryogeny of Comatula rosacea, focusing on the larval development and the formation of pseudembryos. The author observes the transformation of the larva into a Crinoid and describes the morphological and physiological relations of the larval zooid, proposing the term 'pseudembryo' for these independently organized zooids.
